snippet: Hopes for the horse running the Preakness and Belmont were dashed after he was a late scratch for the Kentucky Derby.
abstract: Thoroughbred racehorse International Star is sidelined from Preakness and Belmont Stakes and will require surgery for chip in his left front ankle.
lead_paragraph: Hopes for the horse running the Preakness and Belmont were dashed after he was a late scratch for the Kentucky Derby.

headline.main: International Star Is Sidelined Until Fall
headline.print_headline: International Star Is Sidelined Until Fall
